Wavelet l1-norm prediction from one-point PDF

wale.ComputePDF module

class wale.ComputePDF.computePDF(variables, variance, plot_scgf=False)[source]

Bases: object

A class to compute the Probability Distribution Function (PDF) for kappa using various cosmological and variance parameters contained within an instance of VariablesGenerator.

Methods

compute_pdf_for_kappa(kappa, lambda_new, ...)

Computes the PDF for a given kappa value using the computed phi values by applying bromwhich integral.

compute_pdf_values()

Computes PDF values for a range of kappa values.

compute_phi_values()

Computes phi values for the lambda range specified in the VariablesGenerator instance.

get_scgf()

Computes the scaled cumulant generating function (SCGF) using parameters from the VariablesGenerator instance.
compute_pdf_for_kappa(kappa, lambda_new, phi_values)[source]

Computes the PDF for a given kappa value using the computed phi values by applying bromwhich integral.

compute_pdf_values()[source]

Computes PDF values for a range of kappa values.

compute_phi_values()[source]

Computes phi values for the lambda range specified in the VariablesGenerator instance. Optionally plots the SCGF if plot_scgf is True.

get_scgf()[source]

Computes the scaled cumulant generating function (SCGF) using parameters from the VariablesGenerator instance.
